name: The Scarf
description:
Welcome to The Scarf, a small platform side-scroller, following the mysterious journey of a frozen boy and his scarf through the treacherous icy tundra, avoiding the falling hazards and using the wind to your advantage.

The key features of this game is its simplistic yet pleasing look to the game that will leave you mesmerized and unsatisfied at the same time that there isn't more to play. The game is also free to play so that as many people as possible can play.
